manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Schick Intuition Natural Sensitive Care Moisturizing Razor Blade Refills Simplify your shave. Lather and shave in one step. No need for Shave Gel. Schick Intuition is the razor system that lathers, shaves and moisturizes during shaving - in one easy step - so there’s no need to use shave gel. The Schick Intuition Sensitive Care skin conditioning solid contains 100% natural Aloe and Vitamin E. It’s hypoallergenic, gentle on your skin, moisturizes dry skin during shaving, and will leave skin feeling smooth.

Schick Intuition is the simple way to get smooth, beautiful legs. Schick Intuition Sensitive Care Refills each contain a 4-blade pivoting head to glide smoothly along the contours of your legs and body; and it is surrounded by our unique skin conditioning solid that lathers and moisturizes during shaving.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Luxurious Shave Experience
reviews.reviewText: The Schick Intuition Pure Nourishment Women's Razor Refills with Coconut Milk and Almond Oil have transformed my shaving routine into a pampering experience. These refills are a must-have for anyone who values both effectiveness and self-care.The combination of coconut milk and almond oil is a game-changer for shaving. It provides a silky-smooth glide, reducing the chances of irritation and razor burn. No need for shaving cream – these refills are a two-in-one wonder.What truly sets these refills apart is their moisturizing properties. My skin feels incredibly soft and nourished after each shave, making me feel like I've just left a spa. The hydration lasts, preventing dryness even in the driest of seasons.Each refill cartridge lasts longer than I expected, providing multiple shaves before needing a replacement. This makes them not only effective but also economical.The click-on design of these refills ensures a secure fit on the Schick Intuition razor handle, eliminating any worries about them coming loose during use.If I had to find a downside, it would be that these refills are a bit on the pricey side, but for the luxurious shave and skin benefits they offer, it's a worthwhile investment in self-care.In conclusion, Schick Intuition Pure Nourishment Women's Razor Refills are a luxurious addition to your grooming routine. They deliver a close and comfortable shave while leaving your skin feeling nourished and pampered. If you're looking for a hassle-free and indulgent shaving experience, don't hesitate to try these refills. Your skin will thank you!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cheaper than buying at Wal-Mart
reviews.reviewText: As a woman who loves smooth legs but hates spending a lot of money, I'm always looking for an affordable shaving solution. That's where Schick Intuition Pure Nourishment Women's Razor Refills with Coconut Milk and Almond Oil come in. These refills are a game-changer.One of the best things about these refills is how good they are for your skin. The built-in moisture bars with coconut milk and almond oil make your legs feel smooth and soft. They're so much better than regular razors that can leave your skin dry and irritated.Another great thing is that these refills are so easy to use. You don't need to use separate shaving cream or gel. The built-in bars lather up nicely, making shaving a breeze. It saves time and hassle.In conclusion, Schick Intuition Pure Nourishment Refills are a fantastic choice. They're affordable, high-quality, and good for your skin. If you're looking for a smooth and nourishing shave without spending a lot of money, you should definitely give these refills a try.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Same quality as in store!
reviews.reviewText: My wife has been using these razors for years. These are the same quality as the ones in store but much more affordable. Will buy again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value for an amazing product
reviews.reviewText: The multi-pack has been great allowing me to not have to shop as often for razors. The Intuition razors have been a life changer for me as I no longer get nicked when shaving my legs or armpits. They smell nice, are easy to use, leave my skin feeling smooth, and last a few weeks. As long as these are still made I’ll keep on using them forever.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Received 3 boxes with bonus 1
reviews.reviewText: I received 3 boxes which had 4 cartridges in each box.. I didnt look at the amount before and was seaching my house looking for the missing box since it said comes with 4 boxes of 3, I was asking my husband when he opened it if he dropped a box. LolI love these razors and buy them often. Makes my skin soft afterwards. I have sensitive skin so I love these for that reason also!
